attributes.additional_details:
We were promised a vote to leave the European Union by the last government, it never happened, we were promised a referendum by David Cameron, it has not happened.
In a "Manifesto pledge" Cameron said that if the EU tried to impose further laws on the UK then he would give us a vote to leave,the EU has imposed more laws so now we demand the promise that Cameron pledged
We demand a referendum to leave the European Union
